statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.Position , AA.PersonID
, BB.PersonType , BB.PersonName , BB.EngName , BB.Email , BB.PhoneNo1 , BB.PhoneNo2 , BB.FaxNo , BB.ImageUrl
FROM dbo.TBrandContact AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.TPerson BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PersonID = BB.ID WHERE AA.BrandID = #BrandID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.Position , AA.PersonID
, PP.PersonName , PP.PersonType , PP.Email , PP.PhoneNo1 , PP.PhoneNo2 , PP.FaxNo
FROM dbo.TBrandContact AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBiz.dbo.TPerson PP WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PersonID = PP.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TBrandContact ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, BrandID, Position, PersonID, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #BrandID#, #Position#, #PersonID#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TBrandContact SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Position = #Position# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
